title: Former Disney star Bridgit Mendler marries Griffin Cleverly at romantic beach ceremony
text:

Former Disney star Bridgit Mendler married her long-term beau Griffin Clevery last weekend.

The Wizards of Waverly Place actress, 26, tied the knot to Griffin on the beach in an intimate ceremony witnessed by their nearest and dearest.

The newlyweds, who have been dating since 2011, shared the news of their nuptials by sharing stunning snaps onto their Instagram accounts.

Bridgit uploaded a gorgeous image of her and her new husband strolling along the sand as she modelled an elegant white gown that featured a plunging lace bodice and tulle skirt.

The blushing bride completed her look with a long veil that cascaded down her shoulder atop of her strawberry blonde tresses.

Looking every inch the dapper groom, Griffin wore a navy blue suit teamed with crisp white shirt and maroon tie.

The Lemonade Mouth star gushed in caption of the snap: "Still riding the high of the weekend Thank you to everyone for the abundance of love that you showered on griff and I. We are so excited for this new chapter."

Griffin posted a series of pictures from their special day which showed the bride and groom gazing lovingly into each others eyes as well as them posing with their bridesmaids and groomsmen.

He penned the gallery: "Got to marry my wild love this weekend. Looking forward to a life of learning, exploring, and love with this one! Glad for all the wonderful family and friends that were able to be a part of it. Won't forget the warmth, kindness, and help of those all around us. Here's to our new family!!"

(Image: @bridgitmendler/Instagram)

(Image: @bridgitmendler/Instagram)

Bridgit and Griffin announced their engagement in April.

The pretty star shared a sweet tribute to her future husband in a caption along with a picture of them at the beach where she flashed her sparking engagement ring.

She wrote: "We thought we should share the news Griff you are a deep thinker, a steadfast companion, a cheerleader and a challenger, and the biggest goof I know. Looking forward to holding ur hand forever."
description: The childhood sweethearts tied the knot over the weekend in front of friends and family
